title: Native Command System & Cross-LLM Routing
summary: Discovered and documented all native commands from swarm history. Built cross-LLM routing system with fallback for executing commands through any agent.
key_learnings: Commands are categorized: crawlers, visuals, email, security, trading, brain
Each actor (b0b, c0m, d0t, r0ss) has permission sets based on their role
LLM routing selects the best provider based on command category
Fallback order: Anthropic → Groq → DeepSeek → OpenRouter
Commands can be executed directly via CLI or routed through LLM interpretation

usage_examples.command: node brain/llm-command-router.js c0m "scan twilio for vulnerabilities"
node brain/llm-command-router.js b0b "make art showing bullish sentiment"

fallback_behavior.trigger: When primary LLM provider fails or is unavailable
fallback_behavior.example: If Anthropic API is down, security commands fall back to Groq, then DeepSeek, then OpenRouter

files_created: brain/data/command-registry.json - Master registry of all commands
next_steps: Add more commands as they're discovered
Integrate with team-discussion.js for auto-command execution
Build dashboard UI to visualize command flow
